question: Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = 3x^4 - 5x^2 + 7$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \frac{2x^3 + 1}{x^2}$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \sin(x) \cdot e^{x}$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \ln(x^2 + 1)$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = x^2 \cos(x)$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \tan^{-1}(2x)$ at $x = 1$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = e^{x^2}$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \frac{\sin(x)}{x}$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = \sqrt{1 + x^4}$ at $x = 2$.
Find the derivative of the function: $f(x) = x^3 \ln(x)$.
